history.title: Purpose-driven innovation, impactful technology
paragraphs: imSoft was born with a clear vision: to help businesses and entrepreneurs harness technology to grow and stand out in the market. What started as a dream soon became a team passionate about innovation and digital efficiency.
From day one, we‚Äôve focused on building solutions that truly make a difference. We don‚Äôt just develop software‚Äîwe create tools that drive business and turn ideas into real results.

Each project has been a challenge, but also an opportunity to learn, improve, and grow alongside our clients. We believe in technology as a bridge to new opportunities, and we‚Äôre committed to making every solution intuitive, efficient, and scalable.

The future of imSoft is clear: to keep innovating, learning, and building digital solutions that help more businesses reach their full potential. We‚Äôre excited for what‚Äôs to come, and we want you to be part of this story.

legal.title: Privacy Notice
legal.introduction: Brandon Uriel Garcia Ramos, also known as imSoft, located in Guadalajara, Jalisco, Mexico, and website imsoft.io/privacy-notice, is responsible for the use and protection of your personal data. We inform you of the following:

sections.purposesTitle: For what purposes will we use your personal data?
sections.purposes: The personal data we collect from you will be used for the following purposes necessary for the service you request:
sections.purposesList: Response to contact form messages, Provision of any requested service.
sections.dataTitle: What personal data will we use for these purposes?
sections.data: To carry out the purposes described in this privacy notice, we will use the following personal data:
sections.dataList: Identification and contact information, Employment data.
sections.rightsTitle: How can you access, rectify, or cancel your personal data, or oppose its use or revoke your consent?
sections.rights: You have the right to know what personal data we hold about you, what we use it for, and the conditions of its use (Access)...
requestRequirements: Copy of an official ID attached.
sections.responseDaysTitle: In how many days will we respond to your request?
sections.responseMediumTitle: By what means will we communicate the response to your request?
sections.trackingTitle: Use of tracking technologies on our website
sections.tracking: We inform you that we use cookies, web beacons, or other technologies on our website...
sections.modificationsTitle: How can you learn about changes to this privacy notice?
sections.modifications: This privacy notice may undergo changes, updates, or modifications due to new legal requirements...
